definition[0]: to emphasize something, sometimes making it seem more important than it really is
example[0]: Play up your strongest arguments in the opening paragraph.
definition[1]: if children play up, they behave badly
example[1]: Jordan’s been playing up in school.
example[2]: I hope the kids don’t play you up.
definition[2]: to hurt you or cause problems for you
example[3]: My knee’s been playing me up this week.
